sentences.en: Affection is life prop up, when justice and affection crisscross, how should choose again?
sentences.cn: 情感是生命的支撑, 当正义与情感交错, 又该如何抉择?

sentences.en: And solving method of breaking stroke phenomena of crisscross stroke is given.
sentences.cn: 算法采用了分区搜索、笔划优先启发式信息来控制转化过程,并给出了解决十字交叉笔划断笔现象的一种方法.

sentences.en: Cows graze beside some of the hundreds of miles of stone walls that crisscross Inishmore.
sentences.cn: 牛儿在吃草,它们旁边是纵横交错在英席陌长达上百英里的石墙.

sentences.en: Four - lane highways crisscross the country.
sentences.cn: 四线干道纵横交叉布于全国.

sentences.en: Highways crisscross, and accessible transportation is very convenient.
sentences.cn: 公路干线纵横交错, 四通八达,交通十分便利.

sentences.en: His car swung round at the crisscross.
sentences.cn: 他的车在十字街口处突然转弯了.

sentences.en: In the gardens, the pavilions, terraces and open halls crisscross and overlap.
sentences.cn: 这个园林, 亭阁错叠.

sentences.en: In this area mountains rise steeply and rivers crisscross.
sentences.cn: 这一地区奇峰陡立,河流纵横.

sentences.en: Sea and sky, in a relaxed tone of scenery, crisscross penetration, one integrated mass.
sentences.cn: 海水、天空 、 景物在轻松的笔调中, 交错渗透, 浑然一体.

sentences.en: Street and lanes winds through the town and the river a crisscross network . Bridges connect roads.
sentences.cn: 小镇上街巷蜿蜒,河道纵横,路由桥通,家家临水,户户通船.

sentences.en: The atavism appears in the crisscross inheritance as well as in the other genetic way.
sentences.cn: 隔代遗传既出现在交叉遗传当中,也出现在其它遗传当中.

sentences.en: The crisscross inlet and outlet make various types of lamp routing possible.
sentences.cn: ※设有纵横两个方向的进出线口,适合多种布灯方案.

sentences.en: These concepts are inter - related and differentiate, making a crisscross network of dialects.
sentences.cn: 这些哲学概念之间互相联系、又互相区别, 构成了一幅纵横交错的辩证图景.

sentences.en: They spent the next two years crisscrossing the country by bus.
sentences.cn: 接下来的两年他们乘公共汽车在乡间来回奔波。

sentences.en: Tourist area lakes, creeks crisscross the forests scattered across the grass.
sentences.cn: 旅游区内湖泊 、 河涌纵横交错,密林遍布,绿草如茵.

trans.tran_cn: 十字形图案，纵横交错的网
